sections.heading: to 60-10-15 - Repealed.Section 60-10-16 - Recompiled.Section 60-10-17 to 60-10-40 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1981, ch. 39, § 128, repealed 60-10-1 to 60-10-15 NMSA 1978, relating to offenses, effective July 1, 1981. For present provisions,see60-7A-1 to 60-7A-25 and 60-7B-1 to 60-7B-11 NMSA 1978.

sections.heading: Recompiled.
sections.text: Recompilations.— Former 60-10-16 NMSA 1978, relating to selling or giving liquor to minors and possession by minors has been recompiled as 60-7B-1.1 NMSA 1978.

sections.heading: to 60-10-40 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1981, ch. 39, § 128, repeals 60-10-17 to 60-10-40 NMSA 1978, relating to offenses and penalties, effective July 1, 1981. For present provisions, see 60-7A-1 to 60-7A-25 and 60-7B-1 to 60-7B-11 NMSA 1978.
